metadata.title: CVE-2014-125013 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in FFmpeg 2.0 and classified as problematic. Thisissue affects the function msrle_decode_frame of the filelibavcodec/msrle.c. The manipulation leads to memory corruption. The attackmay be initiated remotely. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix thisissue.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
